info.name: Rails POS GraphQL API - Complete Test Suite
info.description:
Comprehensive test suite for Rails POS GraphQL backend API. Contains all 20 tests covering queries, mutations, error handling, and schema introspection.

**Features Tested:**
- Product & Category Management
- Order Processing & Customer Management
- Payment & Shipping Options
- Error Handling & Validation
- GraphQL Schema Introspection

**Created by:** Rails POS Development Team
**Version:** 1.0.0

item.name: üìã Query Tests

request.description: Fetches all product categories with their ID, name, and position.
Fetches all products with their details including price, type, and status.
Filters products by category ID and active status.
Fetches all orders with their reference, status, total, and creation date.
Fetches a specific order by its ID.
Searches for customers by name or other criteria.
Fetches available payment methods with their fees.
Calculates shipping options based on delivery address and items.

item.description: All query operations for fetching data from the GraphQL API.

item.name: üîÑ Mutation Tests

request.description: Creates a new product category with name and position.
Creates a new product with all required details.
Updates an existing product's name and price.
Creates a new order with customer information and order items.
Confirms a pending order, changing its status to CONFIRMED.

item.description: All mutation operations for creating, updating, and managing data.

item.name: ‚ùå Error Handling Tests

request.description: Tests error handling for non-existent fields. Should return field not found error.
Tests error handling for missing required arguments. Should return missing arguments error.
Tests validation error handling with invalid input data. Should return validation errors.

item.description: Tests that verify proper error handling and validation.

Lists all available mutation fields and their return types.
Inspects a specific input type to see its available fields.
